1.42.0.name: drupal/civi_restrict_sg

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.42.0.description: There are some valid cases for manual changes to smart groups in CiviCRM but mostly it confuses users.  This module restricts this ability to admins.
